Definition: "Resample the time-resolution by averaging over every ``n`` snapshots

Description: Add an overall absolute carbon-dioxide emissions limit of ``n`` times of the 1990 base emissions (e.g. ``Co2L0.05`` limits emissisions to 5% of what is calculated in the rule :mod:``prepare_sector_network`` in the function ``co2_emissions_year()``)

Alter the capital cost (``c``), installable capacity potential (``p``), marginal costs (``m``) or installable storage potential (``e``) of components (``Generator``, ``Link``, etc.) with a given carrier by a factor. Example: ``solar+Generator+c0.5`` reduces the capital cost of solar generators to 50\% of original values.
Add distribution grid with investment costs of ``n`` times costs in ``resources/costs_{cost_year}.csv``
Sets the CO2 sequestration potential to ``n`` Mt CO2 per year
